subject: Rugby (Game)
Coaches and Managers
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Peter de Villiers has clear orders from the South African rugby authorities to deliver an improvement in results after a disappointing Tri-Nations series as well as a series of verbal missteps.
snippet: Peter de Villiers has clear orders from the South African rugby authorities to deliver an improvement in results after a disappointing Tri-Nations series as well as a series of verbal missteps.
